metadata.Title: CVE-2023-2700 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: A vulnerability was found in libvirt. This security flaw ouccers due to repeatedly querying an SR-IOV PCI device's capabilities that exposes a memory leak caused by a failure to free the virPCIVirtualFunction array within the parent struct's g_autoptr cleanup.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> looks like this was introduced in: c97518d9b833a607f29b9bb02e3fbe74c011c088

criterions.comment: libvirt: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
